page.title: 09MARYC.HOME LIFE SAT.DAVID
page.content: On Saturdays I wake up at 9.00am,get washed,dressed and go downstairs for breakfast.Then I feed the gerbils.At 9.45am my Dad takes me to football training which lasts 2 hours.I have a shower.My Mum,Dad and I take the dogs for a walk.At 1.15pm we have lunch.If the Dons(Aberdeen football team)is playing at home we may go to the match.If not I play with Bruce,my next door neighbour.We sometimes use his computer,or if it is fine take out our bikes.In my room we play darts and listen to the radio.I see the football scores on TV.In the evening,if the weather is nice I go outside.If not I watch the telly till 9.30pm.Then I get undressed and see sport on TV.
